original_text: Write all the words of this law on the stones that you will put there. Be sure to write them very clearly.’
korean_text: 너는 이 율법의 모든 말씀을 그 돌들 위에 분명하고 정확하게 기록할지니라

sentences.original_text: Write all the words of this law
on the stones that you will put there
Be sure to write them very clearly
